Items.name: Branley
Items.title: The Outlaw
Items.bio: A former merchant sailor who found that bartering went a lot smoother when he was waving a loaded gun in the air, Branley has taken to a more aggressive branch of mercantilism. The inland sea of Axeina holds host to many a pirate who can lay claim to the tides, but Branley knows he need not boast. Only walking down the streets of Ingbridge is advertisement enough of his services to his less than savoury clientele, and a warning to any honest merchants who plan on making the crossing. Often paid by clients on the brink of bankruptcy to rob their ships to spur on dubious insurance claims, Branley seems to remain a necessary evil to many of the elite. Disappearing amongst the sail high waves when pursued by the King’s navy, he has avoided capture thus far through his cunning, charisma, and most importantly of all, his ruthlessness.

abilities.name: Plunder
abilities.description: Branley deals 30 piercing physical damage to one enemy. During Raise the Flag, this ability will deal 45 piercing physical damage to one enemy and it will ignore invulnerability.

abilities.name: Fire the Cannons
abilities.description: Branley fires at all enemies, dealing <color=#FF5C04>10 physical damage</color> to them and <color=#FF00CD>stunning</color> their Physical and Affliction abilities for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Raise the Flag
abilities.description: For 2 turns, all enemies will have their Physical and Strategic abilities cost and additional . During this time Branley will gain 5 points of damage reduction and Plunder will deal 45 piercing physical damage that ignores invulnerability. This ability ignores invulnerability.

abilities.name: Defensive Maneuver
abilities.description: This ability makes Branley <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Braya
Items.title: The Hunter
Items.bio: Shanks of venison, rumps of boar and bolts of bear furs are a necessity for many of the elite of Coela, and they have to come from somewhere. Light footed and keen eyed, Braya is one with the forest, the mountains and with land of Coela itself. Now the elites fiend for something a little more unsavoury than what is usually served at their typical banquet dinners. If the price is good enough, Braya doesn’t mind moving her hunting grounds onto the battlefield.

abilities.name: Hunter's Focus
abilities.description: Braya focuses her mind and assesses the battlefield. Braya gains 4 <color=#EAB65B>Hunter's Focus</color> stacks. During this time, Braya can use <color=#EAB65B>Hunter's Focus</color> again to <color=#FF00CD>ignore</color> all harmful effects except energy cost changes for 1 turn while using up 1 <color=#EAB65B>Hunter's Focus</color> stack.

abilities.name: Quick Shot
abilities.description: Shooting off a lightning fast arrow, Braya deals 20 piercing physical damage to one enemy that ignores invulnerability. For 1 turn, Braya will also become invulnerable to all non-Strategic abilities. This ability uses up 1 Hunter's Focus stack.

abilities.name: Kill Shot
abilities.description: Braya gathers up her remaining Hunter's Focus stacks, shooting off a powerful arrow that deals 40 piercing physical damage to one enemy. This ability ignores invulnerability and it will deal and additional 5 piercing physical damage for each Hunter's Focus stack remaining. This ability uses up all Hunter's Focus stacks.

abilities.name: Disengage
abilities.description: This ability makes Braya <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Cedric
Items.title: The Black Mage
Items.bio: One would think the practising of black magic would lead to one’s banishment from the mage’s guild, but Cedric is a more than esteemed member of the community. Who better to learn about the dark arts than a respected mage? Who better to practise it, deep into the night, than an upstanding citizen like Cedric? Why, who’s better at all?

abilities.name: Dark Soul
abilities.description: Cedric deals <color=#00A3FB>15 magic damage</color> to one enemy for 2 turns. If that enemy dies while affected by this ability, Cedric will heal <color=#1AB000>30 health</color>, permanently gain <color=yellow>5 points of damage reduction</color> and will permanently deal an additional <color=#00A3FB>5 magic damage</color>.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description: Cedric creates a clone of himself. Each time this ability is used, he will gain <color=yellow>25 destructible defense</color> and all his abilities will last an additional turn. This effect stacks.

abilities.name: Time Warp
abilities.description: For 2 turns, Cedric and his allies will have the cost of their abilities reduced by <sprite=4> and the cooldown of their abilities reduced by 1 turn.

abilities.name: Nether Slip
abilities.description: This ability makes Cedric <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn. This ability is not affected by <color=#EAB65B>Mirror Image</color>.

Items.name: Cleo
Items.title: The Hive Empress
Items.bio: Billions. The sheer number of her hive is unimaginable to the human mind. How many have entered through the mouth of the dark funnel that leads to her underground lair in search of her eggs, only to find it empty? It is not until the walls begin to shift around them, revealing the pulsating mass of brood that they have awoken. There are no walls here. Only the hive.

abilities.name: Venomous Sting
abilities.description: Cleo stings one enemy, dealing <color=#FF5C04>30 physical damage</color> to them and <color=#FF00CD>stunning</color> their Physical and Strategic abilities for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Chitin Regeneration
abilities.description: Cleo heals herself back to <color=#1AB000>100 health</color> and <color=#FF00CD>removes</color> all harmful effects on her.

abilities.name: Hive
abilities.description: Cleo heals herself and her allies for <color=#1AB000>40 health</color>. For the rest of the game, Cleo's team will heal <color=#1AB000>5 health</color> at the start of their turn. This ability will be replaced by <color=#EAB65B>Healing Salve</color>. This ability will end if Cleo dies.

abilities.name: Healing Salve
abilities.description: Cleo heals herself and her allies for <color=#1AB000>10 health</color> and gives them <color=yellow>10 destructible defense</color>.

abilities.name: Swarm Summoning
abilities.description: This ability makes Cleo <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Cronos
Items.title: The Magitech Juggernaut
Items.bio: More machine than woman, Cronos belongs to an exalted order of mechanist high priests in charge of protecting the Time Stones, a collection of ancient geological artifacts. Her wholehearted belief in their role in the fate of Coela has led her down a path of vigorous study and experimentation. What began as a studious spirit has turned into obsession, as slowly she has become more dependent on the magi-mechanical exoskeleton gifted to her by her order. Now, waiting in the arcane temples to protect the stones is no longer enough. After all, the best defense is a good offense.

abilities.name: Gravity Well
abilities.description: Cronos creates a powerful gravitational vortex at the target's location, dealing <color=red>20 affliction damage</color> to them and <color=red>10 affliction damage</color> to all other enemies. Only the primary target can <color=#FF00CD>counter</color> or <color=#FF00CD>reflect</color> this ability.

abilities.name: Battlefield Bulwark
abilities.description: For 2 turns, all enemies will be unable to <color=#FF00CD>reduce damage</color> or become <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color>. During this time if Cronos or one of his allies is targeted by a new harmful non-Affliction ability, they will become <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

abilities.name: EMP Burst
abilities.description: Massive electromagnetic pulse radiates from Cronos and deals <color=red>25 affliction damage</color> to all enemies. All affected enemies will take 5 additional damage from Affliction abilities for the rest of the game. After this ability is used, it will be replaced by <color=#EAB65B>Pulse Cannon</color>.

abilities.name: Pulse Cannon
abilities.description: Cronos deals <color=red>15 affliction damage</color> to all enemies for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Magitech Circuitry
abilities.description: This ability makes Cronos <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Dex
Items.title: The Nightblade
Items.bio: Sewer filth. Gutter scum. Rotten grime. These are all words that have been used to describe Dex, and all things he himself enjoys in plenty. Dex may not run anything significant in Ingbridge, but the people who do often call upon his services to keep things moving. In the rank streets of the capital, it is easy to find that Dex is far from the most disgusting thing there.

abilities.name: Shuriken Throw
abilities.description: Dex throws shurikens, dealing <color=#FF5C04>15 physical damage</color> to all enemies. While <color=#EAB65B>Nightblade</color> is active this ability's cost is reduced by <sprite=4>.

abilities.name: Garrote
abilities.description: Dex attacks one enemy from behind, dealing <color=#FF5C04>20 physical damage</color> and <color=#FF00CD>stunning</color> their Physical and Strategic abilities for 1 turn. During <color=#EAB65B>Nightblade</color> this ability is improved and targets all enemies and also its cost is reduced by <sprite=4>.

abilities.name: Nightblade
abilities.description: The following 3 turns <color=#EAB65B>Shuriken Throw</color> and <color=#EAB65B>Garrote</color> will have their costs reduced by <sprite=4> and <color=#EAB65B>Garrote</color> will also affect all enemies. During this time Dex gains <color=yellow>30 destructible defense</color> and is <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> to Physical and Strategic abilities.

abilities.name: Rat Pack
abilities.description: This ability makes Dex <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Dura
Items.title: The Monk
Items.bio: High in the mountains lies a well kept temple with a golden pavilion. The long periods of meditative silence are punctuated only by the unified shouts of the monks who train there, day in and day out. Here Dura came as a confused young man many years ago. Through the rigorous training the temple provided him, he honed his emotion into discipline, and his discipline into a sharp martial tool. Now, with the temple in the sights of people who wish to destroy it, he is ready to unleash the full spectrum of his abilities.

abilities.name: Sonic Waves
abilities.description: Dura deals <color=#FF5C04>25 physical damage</color> to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time, that enemy will deal 5 less damage with any non-Affliction ability.

abilities.name: Whirlwind
abilities.description: Dura becomes <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn while dealing <color=#FF5C04>15 physical damage</color> to all enemies.

abilities.name: Tempest
abilities.description: Dura deals <color=#FF5C04>40 physical damage</color> to one enemy and <color=#FF00CD>removes</color> <sprite=4> from them.

abilities.name: Meditate
abilities.description: This ability makes Dura <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Evanore
Items.title: The Summoner
Items.bio: Surrounded by a veil of fur and feathers, Evanore has launched herself onto the scene through her unique magical methods and intimidating aura. Receiving her training from the Guild and continuing her own studies deep in the Waldvollur forest, Evanore has rediscovered an old brand of mysticism and brought it back in full force. With a chip on her shoulder and desire to prove the power of her new style, Evanore is ready to showcase her fantastical art on the battlefield and show everyone what she can do.

abilities.name: Monstrous Bear
abilities.description: Evanore summons a giant double headed bear that deals 30 physical damage to one enemy. The following 2 turns, any enemy that uses a new ability will be dealt 15 piercing physical damage.

abilities.name: Murder of Crows
abilities.description: Evanore summons a murder of crows to assault one enemy, dealing <color=#FF5C04>15 physical damage</color> to them for 3 turns.

abilities.name: Umbra Wolf
abilities.description: Evanore summons an umbra wolf to aid her in battle. For 4 turns, Evanore will <color=#FF00CD>ignore stun</color> effects and gain <color=yellow>50% damage reduction</color>.

abilities.name: Hound Defense
abilities.description: This ability makes Evanore <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Fae
Items.title: The Witch
Items.bio: Deep in the Waldvollur forest, along the river and close to a certain peculiar cliff side a traveller can find a deep tunnel carved into the rocky wall. If they were to enter this tunnel and squeeze their way through the narrow passages, they would eventually find themselves in a large and homely cavern kept by a unique and powerful woman. Fae, the legendary witch of the Waldvollur forest is solitary and mysterious. Why she has come out of her home and travelled far past the Waldvollur treeline, know one knows yet.

abilities.name: Dagger Stab
abilities.description: Fae stabs one enemy, dealing <color=#FF5C04>15 physical damage</color> to them.

abilities.name: Corruption
abilities.description: Fae corrupts one enemy who takes <color=red>10 affliction damage</color> for 3 turns. This ability may not be used on en enemy already affected by it.

abilities.name: Revitalize
abilities.description: Fae heals herself or one ally for <color=#1AB000>35 health</color> and <color=#FF00CD>removes</color> all enemy afflictions from them.

abilities.name: Flash
abilities.description: This ability makes Fae <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Garr
Items.title: The Raging Berserker
Items.bio: Filled to the brim with a rage that can not be contained, Garr lives only to crush his enemies into dust and send them to the ground where they belong. A lost soul, Garr has no interest in any higher luxuries, stopping to eat and rest only as a means to fuel himself for his existence as a whirlwind wreaking destruction throughout Coela. Wherever the clamour of steel is mixed with the screams of the dying, Garr can be found doing what he does best and what he enjoys the most.

abilities.name: Slam
abilities.description: Garr slams one enemy with his axe dealing <color=#FF5C04>20 physical damage</color> to them.

abilities.name: Barbed Chain
abilities.description: Garr slashes one enemy with his chain. They will receive <color=#FF5C04>10 physical damage</color> for 2 turns. Garr will also become <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Recklessness
abilities.description: Garr becomes more reckless, <color=#EAB65B>Slam</color> will deal an additional <color=#FF5C04>20 physical damage</color> and <color=#EAB65B>Barbed Chain</color> will deal an additional <color=#FF5C04>10 physical damage</color> per turn. Garr will receive <color=red>20 affliction damage</color> when this ability is used. This ability can only be used 3 times and the effect is permanent.

abilities.name: Intimidating Shout
abilities.description: This ability makes Garr <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Gruber
Items.title: The Mad Scientist
Items.bio: Within the discretion of the royal family, Gruber is allowed to practise a variety of his experiments under the guise of helping the crown’s interests. Paid handsomely to research and develop cures to some of the most common diseases that blight the land, the King is known to turn a blind eye to some of Gruber’s more unsavoury practises. Such as when a few children in Ingbridge who had gone missing were found in an alley, indescribably conjoined and twisted into something inhuman. At what point does the means of progress become too twisted to justify the ends? Gruber seeks to find the answer to this question.

abilities.name: Poison Injection
abilities.description: Gruber deals <color=#FF5C04>10 physical damage</color> to one enemy. The following turn, that enemy will be <color=#FF00CD>stunned</color> for 1 turn and will take <color=red>20 affliction damage</color>; that enemy will also be <color=#FF00CD>stunned</color> for one extra turn by this ability for the rest of the game. This ability cannot be used on a champion already affected by it.

abilities.name: Adaptive Virus
abilities.description: Gruber releases a virus giving his allies <color=yellow>10 destructible defense</color> and dealing <color=red>5 affliction damage</color> each turn permanently to the enemy team. This effect can stack.

abilities.name: Explosive Leech
abilities.description: Gruber hides an explosive leech on an ally. The first enemy champion to use a new harmful ability on that ally will take <color=red>20 affliction damage</color>; that ally will also take <color=red>10 affliction damage</color>. This damage <color=#FF00CD>ignores invulnerability</color>. This ability is <color=#FF00CD>invisible</color> and can stack.

abilities.name: DNA Enhancement
abilities.description: This ability makes Gruber <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Gwen
Items.title: The Succubus
Items.bio: Whether meticulously trained in the art of seduction or simply born with a gift, Gwen has made a successful living entertaining some of the most prestigious clients in Coela. Duchesses, priests and lords alike have previously fallen under her spell, but now Gwen has her sights set on a much more ambitious client. The King himself. What better way to reach the king than working her way up the heirarchy of officers on the battlefield?

abilities.name: Charm
abilities.description: Gwen charms all enemies and deals <color=#00A3FB>15 magic damage</color> to them each turn for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, Gwen gains <color=yellow>15 points of damage reduction</color> and <color=#EAB65B>Kiss</color> can be used.

abilities.name: Kiss
abilities.description: Gwen kisses one enemy, dealing <color=red>10 affliction damage</color> to them and <color=#FF00CD>removing</color> <sprite=4> from them. This ability can only be used while <color=#EAB65B>Charm</color> is active.

abilities.name: Love Chains
abilities.description: Gwen <color=#FF00CD>stuns</color> all enemies for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Lights Out
abilities.description: This ability makes Gwen <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Hannibal
Items.title: The Blood Lord
Items.bio: A once proud lord ruling over a vast estate tended by swathes of hypnotized peasants, Hannibal was suddenly forced into hiding after the first purging of all vampiric elements in Coela. Living quietly and yet feasting often, Hannibal has managed to survive a succession of several purges since then. Now he has been yanked from is simple life as a lowly vampire slayer of the name Aniel harangues him in her quest to find her father. Tired of a life on the run and his patience far past tested, Hannibal has decided that the next person who seeks to disturb him will not live to regret their decision.

abilities.name: Taste for Blood
abilities.description: Hannibal bites an enemy, dealing <color=#FF5C04>35 physical damage</color> and healing himself for the amount of health lost by the target.

abilities.name: Health Funnel
abilities.description: Hannibal targets one enemy for 3 turns, each turn <color=#FF00CD>stunning</color> their non-Strategic abilities, and <color=#FF00CD>stealing</color> <color=#1AB000>15 health</color> from them. This ability will end if Hannibal dies.

abilities.name: Sacrificial Pact
abilities.description: Hannibal targets one ally, if their health drops to <color=#1AB000>25 health</color> or below while Hannibal is dead, that character will heal to <color=#1AB000>75 health</color>, will have all friendly and harmful effects <color=#FF00CD>removed</color> from them and they will have all their abilities replaced by Hannibal's. This ability is <color=#FF00CD>invisible</color> and cannot be used while active.

abilities.name: Demonic Skin
abilities.description: This ability makes Hannibal <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Hrom
Items.title: The Thunder King
Items.bio: Worshipped as a god in Waldvollur, Hrom rules over the north from the frigid skies through a combination of force and fear. Legend says of how aeons ago his mother was courted by the heavens themselves, leading to the conception of Hrom and his many siblings. Coddled by his superstitious mother who believed in a late prophecy describing how Hrom would be usurped by his own brothers and sisters, she led him to murder his family in a twisted quest to rule over Waldvollur’s sky. Warped by power and trampled by the guilt of what he has done, Hrom wanders the stars casting down his misdirected anger on anyone he sees fit to do so.

abilities.name: Lightning Strike
abilities.description: Hrom deals <color=#00A3FB>25 magic damage</color> to one enemy. <color=#EAB65B>Lightning Storm</color> may be used the following turn.

abilities.name: Lightning Barrier
abilities.description: Hrom creates a barrier to protect himself or one ally for 1 turn. The first enemy harmful non-Strategic ability used on this ally will be <color=#FF00CD>countered</color>. This ability is <color=#FF00CD>invisible</color>.

abilities.name: Lightning Storm
abilities.description: Hrom conjures a lightning storm, dealing <color=#00A3FB>45 magic damage</color> to all enemies. This ability requires <color=#EAB65B>Lightning Strike</color> to be used in the previous turn.

abilities.name: Storm Shield
abilities.description: This ability makes Hrom <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Izrin
Items.title: The Undead Warrior
Items.bio: A less than average warrior in life and death, Izrin’s fate should have been to fade out of the forgetful memories of her close kin after dying at the start of a minor battle during the royal rebellion. It was not until after her death, when she was resurrected to be part of Nezhum’s undead army that Izrin’s life truly began. In a moment of wilful determination, Izrin broke free of the necromancer’s spell and escaped the undead horde. Now wandering the country, she seeks to find her purpose beyond the twilight realm in which she now resides.

abilities.name: Rake
abilities.description: Izrin rakes an enemy, dealing <color=#FF5C04>15 physical damage</color> to them and lowering their non-affliction damage by 15 for 2 turns. <color=#EAB65B>Rake</color> will deal an additional <color=#FF5C04>10 physical damage</color>, and the damage reduction effect will last 1 additional turn for each ally that is dead.

abilities.name: Bloody Strike
abilities.description: Izrin deals <color=#FF5C04>20 physical damage</color> to one enemy and gains <color=yellow>10 points of damage reduction</color> for 1 turn. The following turn this ability will deal and additional <color=#FF5C04>10 physical damage</color> and grant <color=yellow>10 more damage reduction</color>. <color=#EAB65B>Bloody Strike</color> will deal an additional <color=#FF5C04>10 physical damage</color> for every ally that is dead.

abilities.name: Bite
abilities.description: Izrin bites one enemy dealing <color=#FF5C04>20 physical damage</color> to them. Bite will deal and additional <color=#FF5C04>20 physical damage</color> for each ally that is dead and an additional <color=#FF5C04>20 physical damage</color> for every <color=#1AB000>30 health</color> that Izrin is missing.

abilities.name: Will of the Undead
abilities.description: This ability makes Izrin <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Jafali
Items.title: The Ifrit
Items.bio: Hidden deep in the stones of the Tainowak palace walls, many find that it is possible to summon Jafali through a simple ritual. After coming out, the startled summoner may ask him one favour, which Jafali will grant with great pleasure. Many beggars of this dark art have found that the wording of their wish is often ... open to interpretation. The last victim of Jafali’s mischief spoke in such a way as to accidentally let him free, leading to the unfortunate possession of his body. Now at large, Jafali feels a pull towards a mass of people congregating in Coela. Just because he is free doesn’t mean that he’s lost his mischievous streak.

abilities.name: Anger
abilities.description: Jafali applies <color=#EAB65B>Decaying Soul</color> to one enemy and gains <color=yellow>15 destructible defense</color>. Enemy that destroys the destructible defense will have <color=#EAB65B>Decaying Soul</color> applied to them. While the destructible defense is active this ability will be replaced by <color=#EAB65B>Decaying Soul</color>.

abilities.name: Decaying Soul
abilities.description: Jafali targets an enemy. They will receive <color=red>5 affliction damage</color> for 5 turns.

abilities.name: Envy
abilities.description: Jafali applies <color=#EAB65B>Decaying Soul</color> to all enemies and gains <color=yellow>30 destructible defense</color>. Enemy that destroys the destructible defense will have <color=#EAB65B>Decaying Soul</color> applied to them. While the destructible defense is active this ability will be replaced by <color=#EAB65B>Avarice</color>.

abilities.name: Avarice
abilities.description: Jafali applies <color=#EAB65B>Decaying Soul</color> to all enemies.

abilities.name: Pride
abilities.description: Jafali deals <color=red>20 affliction damage</color> to one enemy and <color=#FF00CD>removes</color> <sprite=4> for each <color=#EAB65B>Decaying Soul</color> on them.

abilities.name: Devil's Game
abilities.description: This ability makes Jafali <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Jane
Items.title: The Gunslinger
Items.bio: Most of the saloon taverns in the Western provinces hold whispers of a lone gunslinger. Some call her crooked, others fair, but everyone can agree that she’s a dead shot with nothing to lose. Wandering with her wolf dog Benji, Jane makes a living in anyway her guns can for her, including taking out any “varmint” she meets on the battlefield.

abilities.name: Benji
abilities.description: Jane calls Benji to aid her. The following 4 turns, she will gain <color=yellow>10 points of damage reduction</color>. During this time, this ability will be replaced by <color=#EAB65B>Go for the Throat</color> and any enemy that uses a new harmful non-Affliction ability on Jane will receive <color=#FF5C04>10 physical damage</color>.

abilities.name: Go for the Throat
abilities.description: Jane instructs Benji to attack an enemy, dealing 25 piercing physical damage to them.

abilities.name: Counter Shot
abilities.description: Jane shoots one enemy, dealing 30 piercing physical damage to them. For 2 turns all new stun abilities that the enemy uses will be decreased by 2 turns.

abilities.name: Flashbang
abilities.description: Jane covers herself and her allies, making them <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> to all non-Affliction abilities for 1 turn. Jane only carries 3 of these grenades at all times, so this ability can only be used 3 times.

abilities.name: Misdirection
abilities.description: This ability makes Jane <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Khan
Items.title: The Protector
Items.bio: What god he follows no one knows. What he protects anyone from, if anything at all, is still unknown. Who he protects seems to depend on his passing fancies. Khan fashioned himself the title seemingly out of nowhere, introducing himself with it appended to his name to anyone who would listen. Whatever the state of his mind may be, everyone agrees that they’d rather have him on their side than against it.

abilities.name: Mortal Strike
abilities.description: Khan deals <color=#FF5C04>35 physical damage</color> to one enemy. For 2 turns that enemy wll receive 50% less healing and healing they deal will be reduced by 25%.

abilities.name: Bladestorm
abilities.description: Khan will deal <color=#FF5C04>5 physical damage</color> to all enemies for 3 turns. During this time, <color=#EAB65B>Mortal Strike</color> will deal an additional <color=#FF5C04>10 physical damage</color>.

abilities.name: Hand of the Protector
abilities.description: This ability makes Khan <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 2 turns and will heal him <color=#1AB000>15 health</color> each turn. <color=#EAB65B>Mortal Strike</color> will deal <color=#FF5C04>10 LESS physical damage</color> during this time.

abilities.name: Perception
abilities.description: This ability makes Khan <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Lexi
Items.title: The Wood Elf
Items.bio: Part of a dying race of people living along the Arikem river system, Lexi and her kin fled deep in the jungle after the Reconstruction era. Despite dreams of becoming a world renowned healer, Lexi found that she would have to adapt to a life of hunting on the fringes of Coelan society. As the trees that protect her people recede to the power of buzzing machines and hacking axes, Lexi has come out from the safety of the forest with the aim of wreaking justice to any outsiders she deems as a threat to her way of life.

abilities.name: Thorn Whip
abilities.description: Lexi brings a vine to life that deals <color=#00A3FB>25 magic damage</color> to one enemy. While <color=#EAB65B>Tranquility</color> is active, this ability will deal <color=#00A3FB>35 magic damage</color> to one enemy and <color=#00A3FB>10 magic damage</color> to all others. Only the primary target can <color=#FF00CD>counter</color> or <color=#FF00CD>reflect</color> this ability.

abilities.name: Nourish
abilities.description: Lexi heals half of hers or one ally's missing health (rounded down) and <color=#FF00CD>removes</color> all enemy affliction effects from them. While <color=#EAB65B>Tranquility</color> is active, this ability will cost <sprite=4> and have no cooldown.

abilities.name: Tranquility
abilities.description: Lexi gains 3 <color=#EAB65B>Tranquility</color> stacks. During this time, each time Lexi uses an ability other than <color=#EAB65B>Shadowmeld</color>, she will use up 1 <color=#EAB65B>Tranquility</color> stack. While <color=#EAB65B>Tranquility</color> is active, Lexi can use this ability again for no cost to restore <color=#1AB000>25 health</color> and <color=#FF00CD>remove</color> all enemy harmful effects on her.

abilities.name: Shadowmeld
abilities.description: This ability makes Lexi <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Lucifer
Items.title: The Mysterious Traveler
Items.bio: In the dead of night, a local saloon may hear a rapping on their door. Upon answering, a lone stranger will charm his way in, receiving any food and drink he asks for. He’ll spend the whole night making the landlords laugh and sing while he consumes their pantry, their coffers and their soul. If any landlord attempts to wake up from the spell, he’ll find that Lucifer can take on a very different form than the handsome young stranger they let in.

abilities.name: Heart of Darkness
abilities.description: This ability affects <color=#EAB65B>Shadow Bolts</color>. First use changes Rank 1 to Rank 2. Second use changes Rank 2 to Rank 3. Third use changes Rank 3 back to Rank 1. This ability is <color=#FF00CD>invisible</color>.

abilities.name: Shadow Bolts
abilities.description: 1) Rank 1 deals 15 piercing magic damage to one enemy and ignores invulnerability. 2) Rank 2 deals 25 magic damage to one enemy. 3) Rank 3 deals 20 magic damage to all enemies.

abilities.name: Dark Chalice
abilities.description: Lucifer drinks from his chalice. Lucifer will deal <color=#00A3FB>35 magic damage</color> to all enemies when he dies. This ability may only be used once and is <color=#FF00CD>invisible</color> until he dies. This ability becomes <color=#EAB65B>Cursed Crow</color> when used.

abilities.name: Cursed Crow
abilities.description: Lucifer targets one enemy. <color=#EAB65B>Dark Chalice</color> will deal an additional <color=#00A3FB>10 magic damage</color> to that enemy permanently. This effect stacks. This ability is <color=#FF00CD>invisible</color>.

abilities.name: Demon Form
abilities.description: This ability makes Lucifer <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Luther
Items.title: The Blacksmith
Items.bio: Deep in the pits of Fa’lmur the ringing of steel on steel would echo off the rock walls, the sound mixing with the stifling heat of the volcanic crater. Cursed by the mountain for his greed, Luther toiled away forging the war hammer Hrau’stal, his sweat hissing into steam as it rolled over his branded head. When the thundering of metal and rock finally ended and the cavern walls tore themselves apart, he felt the pull of the mountain spirits lead him into the cool outside air. Now, he fights fiercely on the battlefield with Hrau’stal by his side. For what purpose, only the mountain spirits seem to know.

abilities.name: Flamestrike
abilities.description: Luther strikes one enemy for 2 turns, dealing <color=#FF5C04>20 physical damage</color> to them and increasing the cost of all their Strategic abilities by <sprite=4> during this time.

abilities.name: Fiery Brand
abilities.description: Luther brands one enemy. The following turn, the first new Strategic ability that the enemy uses will be <color=#FF00CD>countered</color> and if <color=#EAB65B>Flamestrike</color> is used on that enemy, it will last 2 additional turns. This ability is <color=#FF00CD>invisible</color>.

abilities.name: Living Forge
abilities.description: Luther gains <color=yellow>20 points of damage reduction</color> for 4 turns. The following 4 turns, this ability will be replaced by <color=#EAB65B>Forge Spirit</color> and any time the enemy team uses a new Strategic ability, Luther's damage will be increased by 5 for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Forge Spirit
abilities.description: Luther deals 30 piercing magic damage to one enemy and for 3 turns, all original non-affliction damage they deal will be reduced to a maximum of 30. Fiery Brand will also be applied to one random enemy.

abilities.name: Molten Armor
abilities.description: This ability makes Luther <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Moroz
Items.title: The Cryomancer
Items.bio: Hailing from the fiery lands of Iskandar, Moroz started learning his craft to keep cool underneath the desert sun. When the guild of mages took notice of his talent, they forcibly moved him to the frigid North to hone his craft despite his protests. Now one of the most powerful Cryomancers in Coela, Moroz finds that the only way he can heat his icy veins is through the blood pumping action of combat.

abilities.name: Freeze
abilities.description: Moroz freezes one enemy, <color=#FF00CD>stunning</color> their non-Strategic abilities for 2 turns. For 2 turns, that enemy cannot <color=#FF00CD>reduce damage</color> or become <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color>. During this time, this ability will be replaced by <color=#EAB65B>Shatter</color>.

abilities.name: Shatter
abilities.description: Moroz shatters a frozen enemy. The enemy is <color=#FF00CD>instantly killed</color>. This ability requires <color=#EAB65B>Freeze</color> to be active on the enemy. This ability cannot be <color=#FF00CD>countered</color> or <color=#FF00CD>reflected</color>.

abilities.name: Ice Barrier
abilities.description: Moroz creates an ice barrier around himself. Until Moroz is targeted by new enemy Strategic ability, he will <color=#FF00CD>ignore</color> all <color=#FF00CD>stun</color> effects. This ability cannot be used while active.

abilities.name: Frozen Armor
abilities.description: By covering himself with ice, Moroz permanently gains <color=yellow>40 points of destructible defense</color>. This ability cannot stack and will re-apply itself.

abilities.name: Ice Block
abilities.description: This ability makes Moroz <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Nazuc
Items.title: The Stalker
Items.bio: Many travellers go to the jungles of Arikem with the goal of mapping out new sections of the unforgiving rainforest. With heads full of the promise of fame, and their royal contracts promising even more on the discovery of new resources, they never take a moment to take a true look through the foliage of the jungle. It’s only when the leaves rustle, or a branch breaks that they realise where they truly are. By then, it’s too late.

abilities.name: Spear Throw
abilities.description: This ability does <color=#FF5C04>30 physical damage</color> to one enemy. During <color=#EAB65B>Spear Barrage</color> this ability's cost is reduced by <sprite=4>.

abilities.name: Spear Barrage
abilities.description: Nazuc attacks all enemies dealing <color=#FF5C04>15 physical damage</color> to them each turn for 3 turns. The following 3 turns <color=#EAB65B>Spear Throw</color> cost will be reduced by <sprite=4>. During this time Nazuc gains <color=yellow>15 points of damage reduction</color>.

abilities.name: Hunter's Mark
abilities.description: Nazuc mark one enemy who cannot <color=#FF00CD>reduce damage</color> or become <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 3 turns. During this time <color=#EAB65B>Spear Throw</color> and <color=#EAB65B>Spear Barrage</color> will deal an additional <color=#FF5C04>5 physical damage</color> to them. <color=#EAB65B>Hunter's Mark</color> cannot be used on enemy already affected by it.

abilities.name: Seasoned Stalker
abilities.description: This ability makes Nazuc <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Nerissa
Items.title: The Mermaid
Items.bio: When a sailor crosses the Axeina sea, they may be able to hear a shimmering melody emanating from beneath the ripples of the water. They find that the voice becomes clearer and louder as they spend more and more time looking over the taffrail. Eventually they all reach the same conclusion. The only way to really hear the music in its purest form is to dive underneath surface of the sea itself. It’s only until they’ve jumped in and swam down to it’s source, way past the point of no return, that they find the horror of Nerissa’s true form.

abilities.name: Overflow
abilities.description: Nerissa targets one enemy. They will lose all destructible defense and receive 15 piercing magic damage.

abilities.name: Drown
abilities.description: Nerissa drowns one enemy. They will receive 10 affliction damage for the rest of the game and Overflow will deal an additional 5 piercing magic damage to them. This ability cannot target enemy already affected by it and will end if Nerissa dies.

abilities.name: Ancient Spirits
abilities.description: Nerissa heals herself for <color=#1AB000>25 health</color> and gains <color=yellow>25 destructible defense</color>.

abilities.name: Mesmerizing Water
abilities.description: This ability makes Nerissa <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Nezhum
Items.title: The Necromancer
Items.bio: Once a promising young mage lauded with praise and approval by the Guild, Nezhum’s path took a dark turn after a longer than expected trip through the Eastern desert. Expelled from the Guild and in hiding, Nezhum has been biding his time to make his return. In the meanwhile, graves all over Coela have been found empty, the upturned soil fresh and the caskets empty. Where all these bodies have gone is unknown. Where they will end up is down to Nezhum.

abilities.name: Virulence
abilities.description: When activated, any enemy champion that damages Nezhum with a new non-Affliction ability will receive <color=red>10 affliction damage</color> that cannot be removed for 3 turns. Afterwards, this ability can be used on one ally for 2 turns or double the damage of <color=#EAB65B>Virulence</color> against one enemy for 2 turns. This ability <color=#FF00CD>ignores invulnerability</color>.

abilities.name: Oppressive Gaze
abilities.description: Nezhum gazes at his enemies, dealing <color=red>10 affliction damage</color> to them and reducing their non-affliction damage by 5 for 2 turns. Additionally, any enemy affected by <color=#EAB65B>Virulence</color> will also lose <sprite=4>.

abilities.name: Reaper's Mark
abilities.description: Nezhum marks an enemy, beginning a countdown of doom against them. After 4 new harmful abilities are used by that enemy, they will be <color=#FF00CD>instantly killed</color>. This ability does not stack and will end if Nezhum dies.

abilities.name: Bone Armor
abilities.description: This ability makes Nezhum <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Nikto
Items.title: The Old God
Items.bio: In the murky depths of the Axeina sea, a low hum has always resonated throughout the water.Madness has been known to creep into the minds of green sailors from their constant exposure to the “Ringing of the Axeina”. After a while, the noise simply became one of the many charms of the turbulent inland sea. Then all of a sudden, the humming stopped. Of late, the standard debauchery of pirates has turned into something much darker. They complain of twisted dreams of tendrils tugging them to a watery grave. More alarmingly, the surface of the water seems to be shifting in a way that no sea ever should.

abilities.name: Axe of Doom
abilities.description: Nikto deals <color=red>10 affliction damage</color> to one enemy. The following turn, all new <color=#FF00CD>stun</color> abilities that the enemy uses will be decreased by 1 turn, and their new energy <color=#FF00CD>removal</color>/<color=#FF00CD>steal</color> abilities will <color=#FF00CD>remove</color>/<color=#FF00CD>steal</color> 1 less energy. <color=#EAB65B>Ancient Darkness</color> will also permanently deal an additional <color=red>5 affliction damage</color>.

abilities.name: Mind Shatter
abilities.description: For 1 turn, Nikto will target one enemy and will <color=#FF00CD>reflect</color> the first new non-Strategic harmful ability used on him to them. If that enemy uses a new non-Strategic ability during this time, <color=#EAB65B>Mind Shatter</color> will be replaced by that ability for 2 turns and will cost <sprite=4>. This ability is <color=#FF00CD>invisible</color>.

abilities.name: Ancient Darkness
abilities.description: Nikto deals <color=red>30 affliction damage</color> to one enemy. That enemy will also lose <sprite=4> and will be <color=#FF00CD>stunned</color> for 1 turn.

abilities.name: True Sight
abilities.description: This ability makes Nikto <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Nixdrak
Items.title: The Ice Queen
Items.bio: Flying free, the terror of the North Nixdrak terrorises her icy domain from the skies. Unchained from the earth of Coela, and untethered from any modicum of sanity, Nixdrak has carved her figure in Northern folklore as a force of nature. Venturing further than her usual snow covered roost, she seeks to see how far her havoc can be wreaked.

abilities.name: Icy Grip
abilities.description: One enemy will have their non-Strategic abilities <color=#FF00CD>stunned</color> for 1 turn and will take <color=#FF5C04>15 physical damage</color>. If used during <color=#EAB65B>Deep Freeze</color>, this ability will also grant Nixdrak <color=yellow>5 points of destructible defense</color>.

abilities.name: Deep Freeze
abilities.description: Nixdrak gains <color=yellow>15 points of destructible defense</color>. For 3 turns, the enemy team will deal 5 less <color=#FF5C04>physical</color> and <color=#00A3FB>magic</color> damage while taking an additional <color=#FF5C04>5 physical damage</color> from <color=#EAB65B>Icy Grip</color>.

abilities.name: Frost Breath
abilities.description: Nixdrak deals <color=#00A3FB>35 magic damage</color> to one enemy and <color=#00A3FB>20 magic damage</color> to the rest of the enemy team. If <color=#EAB65B>Deep Freeze</color> is active, this ability will also <color=#FF00CD>stun</color> each enemy for 1 turn and will reduce the primary target's <color=#FF5C04>physical damage</color> by 10 permanently. Only the primary target can <color=#FF00CD>counter</color> or <color=#FF00CD>reflect</color> this ability.

abilities.name: Cryo Armor
abilities.description: This ability makes Nixdrak <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Nomagi
Items.title: The Spectre
Items.bio: When the Eastern wind blows hard, under the cover of nightfall Nomagi is one of few who can get the job done. Highly trained in the art of long range reconnaissance and all the trials that come with it, Nomagi is a gun for hire that has travelled far beyond her desert home to fulfil the contracts offered to her. Her fee paid in full, she now seeks a certain religious warrior that has been converting tribes and causing issues for her... less than human client. He may be the only name on her contract, but anyone who gets within her line of sight will find Nomagi doesn’t take warning shots.

abilities.name: Decoy
abilities.description: For 1 turn, the first new non-Strategic harmful ability that targets Nomagi will be <color=#FF00CD>reflected</color> back upon the caster.

abilities.name: Deadeye
abilities.description: Nomagi targets one enemy. That enemy will have their non-Strategic abilities <color=#FF00CD>stunned</color> for 2 turns. During this time <color=#EAB65B>Headshot</color> will <color=#FF00CD>instantly kill</color> that enemy.

abilities.name: Headshot
abilities.description: Nomagi deals 50 piercing physical damage to one enemy. If that enemy is affected by Deadeye they will be instantly killed.

abilities.name: Reload
abilities.description: This ability makes Nomagi <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Onog
Items.title: The Tracker
Items.bio: Beginning as a humble fur trader, Onog has built a far reaching reputation as the best and brightest of the big game hunters. Whether in the jungle, the desert or the tundras of Akullaq, Onog has always found his prey and has never found his match. Tired of his so called “easy existence”, Onog has shifted his sights to the battlefield where maybe finally he can find the opponent he’s been seeking for his entire life.

abilities.name: Cleave
abilities.description: Using his axe, Onog cleaves his opponents, dealing <color=#FF5C04>15 physical damage</color> to one enemy and <color=#FF5C04>5 physical damage</color> to all other enemies. On the following turn, <color=#EAB65B>Rifle Shot</color> will deal an additional <color=#FF5C04>5 physical damage</color>. Only the primary target can <color=#FF00CD>counter</color> or <color=#FF00CD>reflect</color> this ability.

abilities.name: Rifle Shot
abilities.description: Onog shoots one enemy, dealing <color=#FF5C04>15 physical damage</color> to them and <color=#FF00CD>removing</color> <sprite=4> from them. On the following turn, <color=#EAB65B>Cleave</color> will deal an additional <color=#FF5C04>5 physical damage</color> to its primary target.

abilities.name: Bear Trap
abilities.description: Onog sets a trap in the battlefield. For 1 turn if any enemy uses a new harmful non-Strategic ability it will be <color=#FF00CD>countered</color> and they will receive <color=#FF5C04>35 physical damage</color>. This ability ends when triggered and is <color=#FF00CD>invisible</color>.

abilities.name: Tough Skin
abilities.description: This ability makes Onog <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Payne
Items.title: The Shadow Priest
Items.bio: A worshipper of darkness locked into a torturous prison of his own design, Payne wanders Coela infesting its regions with the hideous darkness that emanates from the depths of his mind. Unsure of what reality he has found himself in, Payne has meandered into the sights of the heroes and brigands that make up the colourful population of Coela. They must be sure to not underestimate what they think is only a mad man, for when he turns sights onto them, they will learn the true torture of his fractured mind.

abilities.name: Shadow's Reach
abilities.description: Payne envelops one enemy in shadows, marking them for 2 turns. If this ability is used on an enemy already affected by it, that enemy will be <color=#FF00CD>instantly killed</color>. The following 2 turns, this ability will cost <sprite=3> <sprite=3>. This effect cannot be <color=#FF00CD>removed</color> or <color=#FF00CD>ignored</color>.

abilities.name: Shadow Prison
abilities.description: Payne imprisons one enemy for 1 turn, <color=#FF00CD>countering</color> the first harmful ability they use. If an ability is successfully <color=#FF00CD>countered</color>, Payne will also use <color=#EAB65B>Shadow's Reach</color> on them. This ability is <color=#FF00CD>invisible</color> and ends if triggered.

abilities.name: Darkness Unleashed
abilities.description: Payne gains <sprite=3>. The following turn, <color=#EAB65B>Shadow's Reach</color> will <color=#FF00CD>ignore invulnerability</color> and will be unable to be <color=#FF00CD>countered</color> or <color=#FF00CD>reflected</color> by the enemy.

abilities.name: Shadow Shield
abilities.description: This ability makes Payne <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Qog
Items.title: The Banker
Items.bio: There is no warrior, cultist, or headhunter more ruthless than an Ingbridge banker. While many people working in finance are in it just for the gold, Qog does what he does for his twisted love of the industry itself. Also the gold. Tricking clients into taking high interest loans over short term periods and then cancelling their overdraft without any warning is one of Qog’s favourite past times, however recently he’s been wanting to expand his clientele to the fighters and mercenaries that he’s sure have made a lot of money in their line of work. If they store their money in his coffers and unfortunately pass away, who’s going to come collect? All Qog needs to do is make sure that they don’t stick around to come get what’s his.

abilities.name: Collect Debt
abilities.description: Qog deals <color=#FF5C04>20 physical damage</color> to one enemy. For 1 turn, they will deal 5 less non-Affliction damage and cost of all their abilities will be increased by <sprite=4>. This effect will last 1 additional turn each time it is used on the same enemy.

abilities.name: Pyramid Scheme
abilities.description: Qog targets himself or an ally. For 1 turn, the first new harmful ability used on them will be <color=#FF00CD>countered</color>. The <color=#FF00CD>countered</color> enemy will have the costs of all their abilities increased by <sprite=4> for 1 turn. This ability is <color=#FF00CD>invisible</color>.

abilities.name: Insatiable Greed
abilities.description: Qog deals 25 piercing physical damage to one enemy for each time Collect Debt has been used on them and 30 piercing physical damage for each time they have been countered by Pyramid Scheme.

abilities.name: Time Is Money
abilities.description: This ability makes Qog <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Qynnir
Items.title: The Infernal Wyrm
Items.bio: Living deep underground the deserts of Iskandar, Qynnir swims through the sand and tunnels beneath the dunes. Long respected and near worshipped by the desert tribes, Qynnir survives mostly off of the ritual sacrifices that are, by right, due to it. Recently, the tribes have been turning their attention away from Qynnir and worshipping a new god that has spread to their lands. That will not do, and Qynnir has started to show them why the sacrifices had begun in the first place.

abilities.name: Ignite
abilities.description: Qynnir ignites one enemy. They will receive <color=red>15 affliction damage</color> for 3 turns. During this time, that enemy will be <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> to all new friendly abilities. While this ability is on cooldown, it is replaced by <color=#EAB65B>Molten Fury</color>.

abilities.name: Molten Fury
abilities.description: Qynnir applies <color=#EAB65B>Living Bomb</color> to all enemies.

abilities.name: Conflagration
abilities.description: Qynnir protects himself or one ally. The first new enemy harmful non-Strategic ability used on them will be <color=#FF00CD>countered</color> and <color=#EAB65B>Living Bomb</color> will be applied to the caster. If no ability is countered, Qynnir will gain <sprite=3>. This ability is <color=#FF00CD>invisible</color>.

abilities.name: Living Bomb
abilities.description: Qynnir targets one enemy, 3 turns after this ability is used or if removed, the bomb will detonate, dealing <color=red>25 affliction damage</color> and detonating all other <color=#EAB65B>Living Bombs</color> on the target. This ability is <color=#FF00CD>invisible</color>.

abilities.name: Pyromaniac
abilities.description: This ability makes Qynnir <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Ra'es
Items.title: The Cultist
Items.bio: His mind warped beyond the recognition of even himself, Ra’es lurks in the dark corners of Ingbridge right under the noses of the city officials. Originally in search of an ancient source of power under the Axeina sea to help cure his small town of a plague that was ravishing the country side, Ra’es encountered a powerful source of magic that twisted his mind and began his lifelong worship of a strange and mysterious god-like creature. The cult now rapidly expanding, Ra’es plans to unleash the power he has found. The only issue is... he is no longer in control.

abilities.name: Infuse Evil
abilities.description: Ra'es targets an ally or an enemy. If used on an enemy, he will deal <color=#00A3FB>15 magic damage</color> that <color=#FF00CD>ignores invulnerability</color>. If used on an ally, that ally will gain <color=yellow>15 points of damage reduction</color> for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Parasitic Link
abilities.description: Ra'es plants a parasite onto one enemy. For 2 turns, all new harmful non-Strategic abilities used on Ra'es will be <color=#FF00CD>reflected</color> to that enemy. During this time, they cannot <color=#FF00CD>reduce damage</color> or become <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color>.

abilities.name: Abnormal Growth
abilities.description: Ra'es gains <color=yellow>15 destructible defense</color>. If Parasitic Link is active, the enemy that it is active on will also receive <color=#00A3FB>20 magic damage</color> and be <color=#FF00CD>stunned</color> for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Tentacle Block
abilities.description: This ability makes Ra'es <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Raz
Items.title: The Amphibian
Items.bio: Who knows where Raz is really from? Only the water can be called his true home. As comfortable in the light blue ocean waters as he is in the whirlwind of the inland sea, Raz can be found pulling sailors to their murky demise anywhere a boat can be seen. Part myth, part man, part something unholy, Raz’s fluid movement in water and quick martial ability on land make him a force to be reckoned with anywhere in Coela.

abilities.name: Explosive Jellyfish
abilities.description: Raz targets one enemy, dealing <color=#00A3FB>20 magic damage</color> and <color=#FF00CD>stunning</color> their Magic and Strategic abilities for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Shark Torpedo
abilities.description: Raz does <color=#00A3FB>20 magic damage</color> to one enemy and <color=#FF00CD>stuns</color> their Physical and Affliction abilities for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Whirlpool
abilities.description: Raz unleashes a whirlpool upon one enemy. For 2 turns that enemy will receive <color=#00A3FB>15 magic damage</color> and will have <sprite=4> <color=#FF00CD>stolen</color>.

abilities.name: Aqua Shield
abilities.description: This ability makes Raz <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Samson
Items.title: The Golden Beast
Items.bio: Blessed by the golden sun of the South, Samson stands above his animalistic kin with a marked intelligence and a glowing kindness. Though unable to speak directly, he makes his intentions known through the enchanted diadem that he dons. Having left his pride to travel Coela to seek knowledge to empower the quasi-kingdom he dwells over, Samson has made quite the impression on everyone he has met. Whether that impression is good or bad varies from person to person, and many have had to learn that the fierceness of his kind has not faded in the friendly Samson.

abilities.name: Show of Force
abilities.description: Samson demonstrates his strength, dealing <color=#FF5C04>30 physical damage</color> to one enemy and healing himself <color=#1AB000>10 health</color>.

abilities.name: King of the Jungle
abilities.description: <color=#EAB65B>Show of Force</color> will permanently deal an additional <color=#FF5C04>5 physical damage</color> and also heal an additional <color=#1AB000>5 health</color> each time it is used. During this time, Samson can use this ability to gain <sprite=4>.

abilities.name: Golden Aura
abilities.description: Samson gains an initial <color=yellow>10% damage reduction</color> and an additional <color=yellow>10% damage reduction</color> each time he is targeted by a new enemy harmful ability. This ability may not be used while active.

abilities.name: Kingdom Guardian
abilities.description: For 2 turns, all enemies will deal 5 less <color=#FF5C04>physical</color> and <color=#00A3FB>magic</color> damage and all new harmful non-Strategic abilities used on Samson's team will be <color=#FF00CD>reflected</color> to Samson. Abilities that can target multiple enemies won't be <color=#FF00CD>reflected</color>. This ability <color=#FF00CD>ignores invulnerability</color> and ends if Samson dies.

Items.name: Sanguimon
Items.title: The Sanguine Wind
Items.bio: A legend runs down the Eastern coast of the devastating sanguine wind. Villagers can be heard in taverns murmuring “Once in a blood moon...”. Secret sects of nobles worship at private blood stained altars, praying for personal favour during the crimson nights. Whether a peasant myth or an elitist cult, no one can escape the reality that when the light of the blood moon shimmers off of the island waters it becomes difficult to see if the blood of the newly chosen prey of Sanguimon silently floats downstream. No one yet has survived the night after finding the mark of Sanguimon at their doorstep the previous morning. Very few can claim to have seen his face and lived. The ones who lie about this feat will be found swimming in the crimson tide the following day. Recently, the mark has been found outside the Eastern borders and deeper into Coela. The red glow of the blood moon can be seen lining the clouds of the battlefield as the cult of Sanguimon spreads in earnest.

abilities.name: Massacre
abilities.description: Sanguimon brutally attacks one enemy, dealing <color=#FF5C04>30 physical damage</color> to them and <color=red>10 affliction damage</color> to himself.

abilities.name: Hemospikes
abilities.description: Sanguimon stabs all enemies with spikes conjured from blood. They will receive <color=#FF5C04>20 physical damage</color> and their non-Strategic abilities will be <color=#FF00CD>stunned</color> for 1 turn. Sanguimon will take <color=red>10 affliction damage</color>.

abilities.name: Blood Moon
abilities.description: For 3 turns, all enemies will be unable to <color=#FF00CD>reduce damage</color> or become <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color>. For 2 turns, this ability will be replaced by <color=#EAB65B>Hunt</color>, and any time an enemy uses a new non-Strategic ability, they will be permanently affected by <color=#EAB65B>Hunted</color>. Each stack of <color=#EAB65B>Hunted</color> on the target, increases the health steal of <color=#EAB65B>Hunt</color> by <color=#1AB000>5 health</color>.

abilities.name: Hunt
abilities.description: Sanguimon targets and hunts down one enemy affected by <color=#EAB65B>Hunted</color>, <color=#FF00CD>stealing</color> <color=#1AB000>10 health</color> and <sprite=4> from them. Afterwards, <color=#EAB65B>Hunted</color> will end on that enemy.

abilities.name: Crimson Armor
abilities.description: Covering himself in an armor of blood, for 1 turn, Sanguimon will <color=#FF00CD>counter</color> all new harmful abilities used on him, and Sanguimon will take <color=red>5 affliction damage</color>.

Items.name: Seraph
Items.title: The Archangel
Items.bio: Coela is a land of cheats, brigands and general chaos. By bringing order anywhere she goes, Seraph is one of the few heroes that can truly keep hold of her moniker. Many a “hero” have their own interests in mind, but Seraph has dedicated her life to keeping true evil at bay within Coela. Where she came from is a mystery, but from the moment she touched down from the heavens, life has been a little easier for the peasants and the trodden down upon. No one is entirely sure what her true motives are. Perhaps whoever is next to receive some righteous justice may find out.

abilities.name: Summon Feathers
abilities.description: Seraph summons more feathers. Piercing Feathers and Archangel's Mark will deal an additional 5 piercing magic damage for 3 turns.

abilities.name: Archangel's Mark
abilities.description: Seraph targets one enemy, dealing 25 piercing magic damage to them. This ability can only target enemies affected by Piercing Feathers.

abilities.name: Piercing Feathers
abilities.description: Seraph deals 12 piercing magic damage to all enemies for 3 turns. During this time Archangel's Mark may be used on affected enemies.

abilities.name: Pure Soul
abilities.description: This ability makes Seraph <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Seth
Items.title: The Brawler
Items.bio: One of biggest entertainments for the average person in Ingbridge is to go down to their local pub and watch an illegal underground fight. One of the biggest entertainers in that industry is Seth. Known to drink gallons of ale up until the start of the fight and smoke heavily on his pipe in between rounds, no one’s entirely sure how Seth keeps racking up victories onto his already impressive record. Being paid entirely on whether you win or lose is no issue for Seth, but backroom brawls are starting to get a little boring. It looks like the big timers are all flocking to one place, and Seth intends to make his debut.

abilities.name: Knockout
abilities.description: Seth knockouts one enemy, dealing <color=#FF5C04>40 physical damage</color> to them and <color=#FF00CD>stunning</color> their Physical and Melee abilities for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Unleash
abilities.description: For 3 turns, Seth gains 75% damage reduction and deals 25 piercing physical damage to one random enemy at the end of his turn. This damage ignores invulnerability.

abilities.name: Safeguard
abilities.description: Seth safeguards one ally. That ally gains <color=yellow>20 points of destructible defense</color> permanently. Seth cannot use <color=#EAB65B>Safeguard</color> on himself.

abilities.name: Defensive Stance
abilities.description: This ability makes Seth <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Skret
Items.title: The Greedy Goblin
Items.bio: Gold, gold and gold. These are always said to be a goblin’s top priorities and Skret does nothing to help fight the stereotype. What began as the usual gold lust of his kind has turned into a bloody, deranged hunt for anything he deems shiny. Now uncharacteristically using his own coin to cause damage to whoever he sees as getting in his way, it’s hard to know what Skret is really after any more. It could be possible to find out if someone could just have a conversation with him face to face, but he always seems to be sneaking up from behind…

abilities.name: Throw Gold
abilities.description: Skret throws gold at one enemy, dealing <color=#FF5C04>15 physical damage</color> to them. While <color=#EAB65B>Goblin Spirit</color> is active, this ability will deal an additional <color=#FF5C04>5 physical damage</color>.

abilities.name: Backstab
abilities.description: Skret backstabs one enemy, dealing <color=#FF5C04>15 physical damage</color> to them and <color=#FF00CD>stunning</color> their Strategic abilities for 1 turn. While <color=#EAB65B>Goblin Spirit</color> is active this ability will deal an additional <color=#FF5C04>5 physical damage</color>.

abilities.name: Goblin Spirit
abilities.description: Skret gains <color=yellow>10 points of damage reduction</color> for 5 turns. During this time <color=#EAB65B>Throw Gold</color> and <color=#EAB65B>Backstab</color> will deal an additional <color=#FF5C04>5 physical damage</color>.

abilities.name: Golden Armor
abilities.description: This ability makes Skret <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Strom
Items.title: The Treant
Items.bio: For the first time since the mythical creation of Coela, the long slumbering Treants of Waldvollur have awakened in response to the hacking machines that are tearing them down. Strom, with deep roots in the nobility of his kind, has already felt the biting of the instruments of Coela’s “progress”. Angered by the intrusion and the loss of so many of his kind, Strom is stomping his way to the heartland, ready to show what ancient magic the people of Coela have unearthed.

abilities.name: Sapling Bomb
abilities.description: Strom sends out a sapling that runs towards a random enemy, detonating on impact and dealing 30 piercing physical damage to them. That enemy will have their non-Strategic abilities stunned for 1 turn, and they will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable during this time. This ability ignores invulnerability.

abilities.name: Root
abilities.description: Strom roots one enemy, <color=#FF00CD>stunning</color> them for 4 turns. During this time, they cannot <color=#FF00CD>reduce damage</color> or become <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color>. While this ability is active, it will be replaced by <color=#EAB65B>Terrorize</color>.

abilities.name: Terrorize
abilities.description: Strom terrorizes one enemy dealing <color=#00A3FB>25 magic damage</color> to them.

abilities.name: Reciprocate
abilities.description: Strom targets an enemy for 1 turn. If they use a new harmful ability, they will have the cooldowns of their abilities increased by 1 turn for 2 turns. This ability is <color=#FF00CD>invisible</color> and cannot be <color=#FF00CD>ignored</color>.

abilities.name: Nature's Ally
abilities.description: This ability makes Strom <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Thasar
Items.title: The Death Knight
Items.bio: With a heart colder than the Akullaq nights, Thasar and his undead legion have been wreaking dread havoc on the tundra’s inhabitants. Killed in a bloody battle by Yesfiel as a man, his body was thrown into a glacial ravine only to be revived by a sorcerer to command his growing undead army. Too late the wily sorcerer discovered that Thasar serves no one but himself. With his magical benefactor slumped dead in the black gorge, and now in command of a ghoulish host, Thasar roams the tundra looking for the archangelic woman who twisted his fate.

abilities.name: Frost Strike
abilities.description: Using his enchanted sword, Thasar stabs one enemy dealing <color=#FF5C04>25 physical damage</color> to them. The following turn, that enemy will receive <color=#00A3FB>20 magic damage</color>. Enemies affected by <color=#EAB65B>Hail Storm</color> will receive 10 additional <color=#FF5C04>physical</color> and <color=#00A3FB>magic</color> damage.

abilities.name: Frozen Might
abilities.description: Thasar empowers himself. The first new harmful ability used on him that deals 20 or more original damage will be <color=#FF00CD>countered</color>. This ability is <color=#FF00CD>invisible</color> and cannot be used while active. This ability cannot be used the turn after it ends and will end during <color=#EAB65B>Ice Tomb</color>.

abilities.name: Hail Storm
abilities.description: Conjuring a hail storm, Thasar will increase the cost of all enemy abilities by <sprite=4> for 2 turns. During this time, this ability will be replaced by <color=#EAB65B>Ice Tomb</color> for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Ice Tomb
abilities.description: Thasar trades fragments of his soul to imprison one enemy. They will receive 25 piercing magic damage and will be stunned. During this time, Thasar will receive 10 affliction damage. This ability ignores invulnerability and will last until Thasar uses a new ability or either champion dies.

abilities.name: Army of Eternal Winter
abilities.description: This ability makes Thasar <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Tien
Items.title: The Shadow Assassin
Items.bio: Trained from childhood in the middle of the desert, Tien’s origin has been erased from his memory. During the long nights of hard training under new moons Tien has adapted to living in darkness. His order, whose name is never spoken in fear of summoning them, does not accept payment in goods or gold. Their reputation is enough to strike fear in the hearts of even His Royal Highness and their reputation is all they seek to improve. Fresh out of training and ready to prove himself, Tien is willing to do whatever it takes to make his mark. This is to be expected. The punishment for failure is most severe.

abilities.name: Death Mark
abilities.description: Tien marks one enemy. That enemy will be dealt 20 piercing physical damage and have their Strategic and Ranged abilities stunned for 1 turn. Forbidden Technique may be used on the target the following turn.

abilities.name: Forbidden Technique
abilities.description: Tien uses a forbidden technique on an enemy affected by <color=#EAB65B>Death Mark</color>. That enemy will lose <color=#1AB000>50% of their current health</color>. If that enemy drops to <color=#1AB000>20 or less health</color> they will be <color=#FF00CD>instantly killed</color>. This ability cannot be <color=#FF00CD>countered</color> or <color=#FF00CD>reflected</color>.

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.description: Tien ambushes one enemy, dealing 30 piercing physical damage to them. This ability ignores invulnerability.

abilities.name: Shadow Mastery
abilities.description: This ability makes Tien <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Tinky
Items.title: The Inventor
Items.bio: Bombs! Rockets! Robots! Tinky doesn’t care what she’s working on as long as it goes BOOM. Blacklisted from well over half the workshops in Coela, Tinky still has plenty of work building all sorts of weapons for petty war chiefs and pirates across the world. Even the Royal Guard sometimes like to take a peek to see what Tinky has been building. Of course, Tinky saves the best inventions for herself. Come here, let her show you today’s favourite!

abilities.name: Saw
abilities.description: Tinky deals <color=#FF5C04>15 physical damage</color> to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time, Tinky is <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> to Physical abilities, and if <color=#EAB65B>Spike Bombs</color> are used on that enemy, Tinky will gain <sprite=1>. This ability will end if the target or Tinky dies.

abilities.name: Napalm
abilities.description: Tinky deals 35 piercing physical damage to all enemies.

abilities.name: Spike Bombs
abilities.description: This ability deals <color=#FF5C04>15 physical damage</color> to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time, Tinky is <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> to Magic abilities, and if <color=#EAB65B>Saw</color> is used on that enemy, Tinky will <color=#FF00CD>stun</color> all their abilities for 1 turn. This ability will end if the target or Tinky dies.

abilities.name: Homing Missile
abilities.description: Tinky sends out homing missile that deals 55 piercing physical damage to one enemy.

abilities.name: Robot Suit
abilities.description: Once activated, if Tinky's health drops to or below <color=#1AB000>50 health</color>, Tinky gains <color=yellow>70 points of destructible defense</color>, and all her abilities are replaced by their alternate versions. This ability ends when all the destructible defense is destroyed and can only be used once. This ability is <color=#FF00CD>invisible</color> until triggered and cannot be <color=#FF00CD>countered</color>.

abilities.name: Barrier
abilities.description: This ability makes Tinky <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Overdrive
abilities.description: This ability makes Tinky <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Ukyo
Items.title: The Samurai Master
Items.bio: A warrior with no home, Ukyo wanders the Eastern coast with only one word in mind. Revenge. His wife murdered by Sanguimon, the blood beast of the shore, Ukyo then tore down his martial academy and has spent every waking moment since pursuing the mythical demon. Slicing through blood cults as he follows the murders along the coast, Ukyo means to put a stop to what he sees as ritual sacrifices. He can only hope for two outcomes at this point. To avenge his wife, or to join her.

abilities.name: Flowing Water Slash
abilities.description: Ukyo deals 20 piercing physical damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, that enemy will deal 5 less non-affliction damage. The following turn, Ukyo will deal an additional 5 damage with his abilities.

abilities.name: Waterfall Strike
abilities.description: Ukyo strikes one enemy, dealing 20 piercing physical damage to them. For 1 turn, that enemy will deal 5 less non-affliction damage. The following turn, Ukyo will deal an additional 5 damage with his abilities.

abilities.name: Full Moon
abilities.description: For 2 turns Ukyo targets one enemy, if they use a new ability that <color=#FF00CD>removes</color> or <color=#FF00CD>steals</color> energy, Ukyo will gain <sprite=4>; if they use a new ability that <color=#FF00CD>stuns</color>, Ukyo's damaging abilities will <color=#FF00CD>stun</color> for 1 turn; if they use a new ability that deals damage, Ukyo will deal an additional 10 damage for 1 turn. This ability is <color=#FF00CD>invisible</color> and ends if triggered.

abilities.name: Crescent
abilities.description: This ability makes Ukyo <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Ultrich
Items.title: The Merciless
Items.bio: Shelled in dragonic steel, the beast Ultrich has spent thousands of years trapped deep in the mountains of Fa’lmur. Once a man, years of solitude surrounded by the dark secrets of the mountain have warped his mind into something unnatural. When one day a rogue band of treasure hunters cracked open a glowing seal in the side of a solitary cavern, all but one were swallowed into the abyss. The lone survivor, frantic, arrived at the nearest town spouting incoherent babble of the visions he saw. Whatever Ultrich may be, he is finally out.

abilities.name: Brutal Combat
abilities.description: Ultrich deals <color=#FF5C04>10 physical damage</color> to one enemy for 3 turns. During this time he will also gain <color=yellow>10 points of damage reduction</color> and that enemy will receive an additional <color=#FF5C04>10 physical damage</color> from <color=#EAB65B>Spectral Wrath</color>. This ability will deal an additional <color=#FF5C04>15 physical damage</color> during <color=#EAB65B>Inner Dragon</color>.

abilities.name: Spectral Wrath
abilities.description: Ultrich channels the wrath of the onyx dragon, dealing <color=#FF5C04>30 physical damage</color> to one enemy. This ability will deal an additional <color=#FF5C04>30 physical damage</color> during <color=#EAB65B>Inner Dragon</color>.

abilities.name: Inner Dragon
abilities.description: Ultrich <color=#FF00CD>removes</color> all enemy harmful effects on him, receiving <color=red>50 affliction damage</color>, and then <color=#FF00CD>ignoring</color> all harmful effects except energy cost changes for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, this ability will be replaced by <color=#EAB65B>Impale</color>. The affliction damage this ability deals cannot kill Ultrich, <color=#FF00CD>ignores invulnerability</color> and <color=#FF00CD>cannot be ignored</color>.

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.description: Ultrich impales an enemy, dealing 100 piercing physical damage to them.

abilities.name: Dragonic Steel
abilities.description: This ability makes Ultrich <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Vlk
Items.title: The Silver Moon
Items.bio: In the dead of night with only the sliver of a waning moon illuminating the ground in front of him, Vlk stalks his prey. Ostracized and banished from his tribe on the Ashland wastes for his peculiar personality and his outlandish appearance, Vlk was forced to learn how to become a solitary hunter. Finding solace in the gold and pride of working as one of the King’s Guard, Vlk began branching out to private contracts after hearing some choice words muttered about him in the dark hallways of the royal palace. Once again alone, Vlk has no plans to get comfortable again. His only respite is the hot blooded thrill of the hunt on the battlefield.

abilities.name: Silver Claws
abilities.description: Using his razor sharp claws, Vlk deals 30 piercing physical damage to one enemy.

abilities.name: Sweeping Strike
abilities.description: Vlk deals <color=red>10 affliction damage</color> to all enemies.

abilities.name: Thrill of the Hunt
abilities.description: For 4 turns, Vlk gains <color=yellow>15 destructible defense</color> and both of his damaging abilities will deal an additional 5 damage. This effect can stack.

abilities.name: Beast Within
abilities.description: This ability makes Vlk <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Volgrul
Items.title: The Lost Viking
Items.bio: A Northern man through and through, Vogrul takes pride in his heritage even if his own kin have forsaken him. An adept warrior and dangerous adversary, Vogrul was banished from his frigid homeland after an incident caused by too much mead and his fiery temper at one of Coela’s famed Northern festivals. Now a wanderer, sometimes in the Axeila sea, othertimes in Ingsbridge, he has cooled his mind and honed his steel, ready to redeem himself in the eyes of his people. For reasons unknown, he’s made a few trips to the Eastern desert. What he hopes to find there he keeps to himself, but he’s bound to make a few more enemies before he can go home.

abilities.name: Furious Slash
abilities.description: Volgrul deals <color=#FF5C04>15 physical damage</color> to one enemy. This ability will deal an additional <color=#FF5C04>5 physical damage</color> every time it is used.

abilities.name: Raging Blow
abilities.description: Volgrul deals <color=#FF5C04>25 physical damage</color> to one enemy and gains <sprite=4>. This ability will deal an additional <color=#FF5C04>5 physical damage</color> every time it is used.

abilities.name: Weapon Mastery
abilities.description: For 3 turns, Volgrul's attacks will pierce and deal an additional 10 physical damage. Volgrul will also gain 25 points of destructible defense.

abilities.name: Northern Guard
abilities.description: This ability makes Volgrul <color=#FF00CD>invulnerable</color> for 1 turn.

Items.name: Vrah
Items.title: The Killer
Items.bio: His mind lost deep in his work, Vrah has given up whatever human soul he had left inside of him a long time ago. The best of his kind, he has worked for Borough Patrons, tribal chiefs and Royal clients alike. One day, when in the Far East on a job, something in his head snapped, though it was audible to no one but himself. Since then Vrah has forsaken any payments for his jobs, choosing to fund his own advancements in his career. Not having a boss gives him the freedom of choice to select whichever targets he desires. How he chooses them is as much of a mystery as what happened to him in that dark, Eastern desert.

abilities.name: Rip and Tear
